question:
7. Oralit merupakansalah satu contoh campuran    homogen karena dapat menyatu secara merata.
Oralit ini merupakan campuran dari....
A. gula dan garam
B. air dan garam
C. air dan gula
D. air, gula dan pewarna​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. air, gula dan pewarna.

I hope this help

semoga membantu

related_questions.question: Kata kerja present perfect tense dari bring, hate, feat, finish, di, draw, kick, write, call

answers.answer:
Bring = brought
Hate = hated
Finish = finished
Do = done
Draw = drawn
Kick = kicked
Write = written
Call = called
